辟.definition: penal law; variant of 闢|辟[pi4]

辟穀.definition: (Taoism) to abstain from eating cereals; to fast; also pr. [pi4gu3]

辟邪.definition: to ward off evil spirits; mythical lion-like animal that wards off evil (also called 貔貅[pi2 xiu1])

辟雍.definition: central of the five Zhou dynasty royal academies

辟雍硯.definition: ink slab or ink stone of celadon or white porcelain with unglazed surface
